explanation: [0-0] The video begins with two split screens, one above the other. The upper screen shows a football match between two teams on a field, one in blue uniforms and the other in red. Advertising boards with orange and white letters stand on the sidelines, and the stands are packed with spectators. The lower screen shows Jose Mourinho in a dark blue top and two other people on the edge of a red bench. The person on the left side of the screen is wearing a red jersey, while the person on the right is wearing a black down jacket. Behind them are other players in red jerseys. Behind the red bench are spectator stands with blue seats, where spectators are watching the game.

[0-10] In the upper screen, a player in a red jersey passes the ball to a teammate in the lower right corner of the screen. After receiving the ball, this player dribbles forward, and a player in a blue jersey runs towards him to intercept. After some maneuvering, the player in the red jersey passes the ball back to the teammate who had passed it to him. This teammate then passes the ball to a player near the goal, who heads the ball into the net. In the lower screen, Jose Mourinho talks to the player next to him while drawing on a piece of paper with a pen. Then, he pulls out the top sheet of paper and hands it to the person on the right side of the screen. As the goal is scored in the upper screen, the people in the lower screen simultaneously look towards the right front of the screen.

[10-14] At this point, in the upper screen, two players from the red team run towards the right side of the screen after their team scores a goal. The blue team players also turn and leave.
